mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM "ROW_NUMBER", A.PD_SALE_TB_NO, a.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, A.PD_SALE_TB_PRODUCT_NAME, A.PD_SALE_TB_REMAINING_AMOUNT, A.PD_SALE_TB_LIMIT_AMOUNT, PD_SALE_TB_START_DAY FROM( SELECT PD_SALE_TB_NO, PRODUCT_TB_CODE, PD_SALE_TB_PRODUCT_NAME, PD_SALE_TB_REMAINING_AMOUNT, PD_SALE_TB_LIMIT_AMOUNT, PD_SALE_TB_START_DAY FROM PD_SALE WHERE PD_SALE_TB_START_DAY>#{dayFrom} AND PD_SALE_TB_START_DAY<#{dayTo} AND PD_SALE_TB_STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY PD_SALE_TB_START_DAY DESC ) A

SELECT ROWNUM "ROW_NUMBER", A.PD_SALE_TB_NO, a.PRODUCT_TB_CODE, A.PD_SALE_TB_PRODUCT_NAME, PD_SALE_TB_START_DAY, PD_SALE_TB_EXPIRE_DAY FROM( SELECT PD_SALE_TB_NO, PRODUCT_TB_CODE, PD_SALE_TB_PRODUCT_NAME, PD_SALE_TB_START_DAY, PD_SALE_TB_EXPIRE_DAY FROM PD_SALE WHERE PD_SALE_TB_EXPIRE_DAY BETWEEN #{dayFrom} AND #{dayTo} AND PD_SALE_TB_STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY PD_SALE_TB_EXPIRE_DAY DESC ) A
SELECT PD_SALE_TB_NO, PD_SALE_TB_PRODUCT_NAME, PD_SALE_TB_REMAINING_AMOUNT, PD_SALE_TB_LIMIT_AMOUNT FROM PD_SALE WHERE PD_SALE_TB_REMAINING_AMOUNT <= PD_SALE_TB_LIMIT_AMOUNT
SELECT PD_SALE_TB_NO, PD_SALE_TB_PRODUCT_NAME, PD_SALE_TB_EXPIRE_DAY FROM PD_SALE WHERE PD_SALE_TB_EXPIRE_DAY < (SYSDATE+60)
